title: Challenger Ahri skin
body: I'm wondering if anyone knows when the challenger Ahri skin will be available, anyone here know? {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
Its usually around this time of the year, so I'm not too sure.

However imo challenger isnt even that good. Would easily recommend popstar and arcade over them any day.
probably the start of next season or during LCS or something I think its related to that generally
